column3: Fieldwardens are esteemed figures in Halfling society, they know everyone and everyone knows them. Their sole presence can instill courage in the heart of fellow Halflings.
The presence of a Fieldwarden often leads nearby Halflings to try and outdo eachother in an effort to impress the Fieldwarden.
Lone Fieldwardens are often posted in the forests and hills at the borders of the Moot in order to stop any covert enemy incursions.
And stay out, unless you want the next one  to hit something more sensitive!

column4: For all that is Pure and Good
